category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEWiDcdNotEditableProperties
preference.preference_description: Specifies the list of data collection properties (DCDs) that cannot be edited in the Properties dialog box of the Work Instructions view. Valid Values: Accepts strings of the following format:DCD_type:att1,att2... DCD_type is a descendant type of the DCD base form.
